# ðŸ§ªGamification{#xgamification}

At the top right of the app, you will see some feedback on your progress in coding your file.

![image-20220430193751134](_assets/image-20220430193751134.png)

These show you:

- number of (top level) factors. You get a warning if this is more than100.
- ratio of links to (top level) factors. You get a warning if this is less than 3.
- percentage of statements which have been coded. You get a warning if this is less than 60%.
